content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own such simple shawl using this crochet pattern in pdf format this pattern contains explained written instructions in us crochet terminology the finished dimensions are 65cm/25 5 height and 165cm/65 wide when lying flat the printable pdf is written in english and has a total of 3 pages including the cover page available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my linked blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg
